profileAlternative.name: Shuyi Lu
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist
profileAlternative.summary:
● Enthusiastic about financial services and data analysis related career
● Excellent analytical and modeling skills and strong academic background in statistics, mathematics, computer science
● Proficient in programming language R, Python, MySQL; Familiar with Java data structure, algorithms, and SAS
● Strong knowledge of statistical probability and inference, Bayesian statistics, stochastic calculus and processes, Brownian Motion, options, futures, Portfolio Theory, VaR, Copulas, PDE, matrix theory
● Hands-on real data manipulation and analysis experience in application of machine learning, regression models, time series
● Creative thinker, self-starter, quick learner, energetic team player, detail-oriented and well-organized leader
● Please Feel free to contact me by email: sl4055@columbia.edu
